report.title: Lab Notes from an Unintentional Experiment
report.author: Dr. James Moore
report.bodytext: /n /n /n After handling the compound for about 2 days pharmacological reactions became apparent: Stumbling gait, inability to concentrate or converse effectively, dilated pupils, pink fingernails & blotchy pink hands with fingers dark pink and swollen -- very little tactile sense. Tendency toward tremors; sudden deep breathing. Very weak legs. Dry skin -- no sweating; distortion of distance and time. /n /n The above symptoms were still almost full-blown on Wed 28 Nov, about 48 hours after onset (first noticed Mon. 26 Nov. /n /n Thurs. 29 Nov: Legs better, tremors fewer. Skin still pink. Eyes still very dilated & painful. /n /n Fri. Symptoms about the same - hands less swollen - pupils still dilated -- At 7:00 PM and 12:00 midnight took 100 mg. 5-amino-1,2,3,4 tetrahydroacridine (from K. Koniacial /n -- recx / benzene - mp. 182-183 /n /n Sat Dec 4 -- pupils normal size -- better motor control although legs still weak & tired.
